name: Gaming Phones
description: Smartphones designed for high performance and optimal gaming experience.

name: Flagship Phones
description: Top-tier smartphones with cutting-edge features and premium build quality.

name: Budget Phones
description: Affordable phones offering solid performance and good value.

name: Tablets
description: Larger mobile devices ideal for reading, entertainment, and productivity on the go.

name: Wearables
description: Smart devices like smartwatches and fitness trackers that you can wear.

name: Accessories
description: Essential add-ons like cases, chargers, and audio gear to enhance your device.

name: Power Banks
description: Portable battery packs to keep your devices charged on the move.

name: Chargers & Cables
description: Reliable chargers and cables for fast, efficient charging and data transfer.

name: Phone Cases
description: Protective and stylish phone cases tailored for various models.

name: Screen Protectors
description: Durable protectors to guard your screen against scratches and cracks.

name: Smartwatches
description: Wrist-worn smart devices that connect to your phone and track fitness, messages, and more.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Compact, wireless earphones with Bluetooth connectivity and great sound quality.

name: Headphones
description: Over-ear and on-ear headphones delivering immersive sound and comfort.

name: Bluetooth Speakers
description: Portable speakers that wirelessly stream audio from your devices.
